summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly higher on Tuesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 28
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly higher on Tuesday, with 11 gaining and seven declining.
Bitcoin rose 1.7% to $27,425 by market close.
